item.title: About
item.description: Hi there Hi, I’m Sadegh Hayeri, currently working as a Software Engineer at Yektanet in the SRE Automation Platform team. I completed my BSc in computer engineering at the University of Tehran. I am also an open-source enthusiast and have created projects that were listed in GitHub trending. Interests Distributed Computing Computer Systems and Networks Software Engineering
item.content:
Hi there

Hi, I’m Sadegh Hayeri, currently working as a Software Engineer at Yektanet in the SRE Automation Platform team. I completed my BSc in computer engineering at the University of Tehran. I am also an open-source enthusiast and have created projects that were listed in GitHub trending.

Interests

  • Distributed Computing
  • Computer Systems and Networks
  • Software Engineering
